name: vernemq
description: VerneMQ is a scalable, high-availability MQTT broker designed for IoT and messaging workloads. It supports clustering, plugins, and standard MQTT clients, operated through configuration and CLI tools.

features.title: Mqtt Broker
features.description: Provide MQTT messaging for IoT devices and applications with full protocol support

features.title: High Availability
features.description: Run in clustered mode for fault tolerance and automatic failover

features.title: Scalability
features.description: Scale horizontally by adding nodes to handle millions of concurrent connections

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Extend functionality with plugins for authentication, authorization, and custom logic

features.title: Websocket Support
features.description: Allow web browsers to connect via MQTT over WebSockets

features.title: Bridge Mode
features.description: Bridge to other MQTT brokers for hybrid cloud or multi-site deployments

features.title: Qos Levels
features.description: Support all MQTT quality of service levels for reliable message delivery

features.title: Retained Messages
features.description: Store and deliver retained messages to new subscribers automatically
